Class CashRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • CashRegister
  • public class CashRegister
extends java.lang.Object
    The CashRegister class contains all functionality of the purchasing and modifying of items that are being sold.

    • Method Detail

      • promptStartShopping

        public static void promptStartShopping()
        Starts a session in where the user must input prompted values to purchase items. After the user will be able to edit the stock items were bought from.

      • promptSelectFile

        public static Stock promptSelectFile​(java.util.Scanner input)
        Static Member function - Starts a session in where the user must select an apporiate response. In this session the user submit a path to a file. If the file is not valid, continuously prompt the user for a valid file.
        Parameters:
        input - - The users input Scanner
        Returns:
        The Stock filled with values from a file

      • promptStartShopping

        public static boolean promptStartShopping​(java.util.Scanner input)
        Static Member function - Starts a session in where the user must select an apporiate response. In this session the user must select Y or N (case insenstive). If the user sends in an invalid response, the user will be prompted to select an apporiate response until they have selected such.
        Parameters:
        input - - The users input Scanner
        Returns:
        Boolean value if the user selects Y (Yes) or N (no)

      • promtEndTransaction

        public static float promtEndTransaction​(Receptacle shoppingCart,
                                        java.util.Scanner input)
        Static Member function - Starts a session in where the user must select an apporiate response. In this session the user must pay out what they have in the shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        shoppingCart - - Receptacle that holds Item
        input - - The users input Scanner
        Returns:
        Full cost of the current session

      • purchase

        public static double purchase​(double balance,
                              double bill)
        Static Member function - Function used to calculate the change the user will receive after purchase.
        Parameters:
        balance - - Amount the user submitted
        bill - - Cost of all items + tax
        Returns:
        The change the user will recieve
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The user inputs insufficient funds

      • promptQuantity

        public static void promptQuantity​(Item item,
                                  Receptacle shoppingCart,
                                  java.util.Scanner input)
        Static Member function - Starts a session in where the user must select an apporiate response. In this session the user must select a number greater than 0 to add to the amount of the item they have in their shopping cart.
        Parameters:
        item - - Item that will have its quantity raised
        shoppingCart - - Receptacle the item is in
        input - - The users input Scanner

      • promptAddItem

        public static void promptAddItem​(java.util.Scanner input,
                                 Stock stock)
        Static Member function - Starts a session in where the user must select an apporiate response. In this session the user must fill out the forms correctly to create a new Item in the Stock.
        Parameters:
        input - - The users input Scanner
        stock - - Stock that an Item will be added to

      • promptDeleteItem

        public static void promptDeleteItem​(java.util.Scanner input,
                                    Stock stock)
        Static Member function - Starts a session in where the user must select an apporiate response. In this session the user must submit a valid Code to delete its associated Item in the Stock.
        Parameters:
        input - - The users input Scanner
        stock - - Stock where an Item will be deleted

      • promptModifyItem

        public static void promptModifyItem​(java.util.Scanner input,
                                    Stock stock)
        Static Member function - Starts a session in where the user must select an apporiate response. In this session the user must submit a valid Code to modify it.
        Parameters:
        input - - The users input Scanner.
        stock - - Stock where an Item will be modified

      • promptUpdateStock

        Parameters:
